English: En route to the front
Two days later, northern Kolguyev
I have to commend you for your performance, Rashiv. I am almost starting to consider assigning you to the spetsnaz!
Thank you, comrade Lemontov! But I am not of that stock. The battlefield is where I feel at home.
I know, Rashiv. After all, I knew your father. You're very much alike.
Really? I didn't know that. How well did you know him?
As much as two officers in the corp can know each other.\nHe was a good soldier, brave and determined... You remind me greatly of him.
Were you... were you there when he died?
I think that discussion is best left for another time. You are needed at the front, Rashiv.\nGood luck and dismissed!
By your orders, comrade Lemontov!
What can we expect from the enemy, comrade Shaposhnikov?
Light tanks or APCs and a shit ton of infantry.
I can't believe we're losing this quickly! We lost half the island in four days!\nEven Everon blends in comparison to this.
They landed in the south where the terrain is open. Ideal for their tanks and numerical superiority.
Exactly, Rashiv! So do not worry, men, we shall stop them here in the mountains and forests!\nCheck your weapons, we're close!
SHIT, THIS LOOKS WORSE THAN WE EXPECTED. QUICKLY, OUT OF THE TRUCK!
FINALLY, ROMAN, WE'RE BARELY HOLDING THEM BACK! THEY'RE IN THE BASE!
COME ON, COMRADES! HOLD THEM OFF!
MORE WILL COME! TO THE FRONT, LET'S GO!
ROMAN TO BAZA, THE ENEMY IS NUMEROUS, WE NEED REINFORCEMENTS. OVER.
BAZA TO ROMAN, REINFORCEMENTS ARE ON THEIR WAY, BUT IT WILL TAKE MORE TIME. WE COUNT ON YOU TO HOLD THE DNIEPER BASE UNTIL THEY ARRIVE. BAZA OUT.
YOU HEARD THE MAN, ASSUME DEFENSIVE POSITIONS! RASHIV, THAT MACHINE GUN IS STILL OPERATIONAL. GET ON IT AND COVER OUR LEFT FLANK!
HERE THEY COME! STAY STRONG, COMRADES, AND HOLD!
I'M HEARING TANKS IN THE DISTANCE.. SHIT...
THE MINES SHOULD STILL BE UP, DON'T WORRY. JUST STAY CLOSE TO THE GROUND!
I'M NOT TAKING ANY CHANCES. RASHIV, LOOK FOR AN RPG. GO!
GOOD WORK, COMRADES. WE DID IT.
ROMAN TO BAZA, THE DEFENCE WAS A SUCCESS. WHERE ARE THE REINFORCEMENTS? OVER.
NEW ORDERS ROMAN, SQUAD BORIS IS ON ITS WAY, JOIN THEM IN THE COUNTERATTACK AGAINST THE ENEMY POSITIONS. BAZA OUT.
IT SEEMS WE ARE NOT YET DONE FOR THE DAY, COMRADES. ON ME!
GET IN, ROMAN. IT'S TIME TO PAY THEM BACK IN THEIR OWN COIN.
THEY DID NOT HAVE TIME TO PUT UP ANY DEFENCES. FORWARD, COMRADES!
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, THE COUNTERATTACK WAS A SUCCESS. WE SEIZED ASTRABISK, A STRATEGIC POSITION IN CENTRAL KOLGUYEV. THE WAR IS NOT YET DECIDED, COMRADES! BAZA OUT.
BAZA TO ALL UNITS, IT SEEMS WE ARE UNABLE TO HOLD THE DNIEPER BASE. REINFORCEMENTS ARE TOO FAR AWAY. YOU HAVE TO RETREAT, COMRADES. REGROUP IN THE NORTH AND AWAIT FURTHER INSTRUCTIONS. BAZA OUT.
